solution.linktext: Use the Microsoft Platform Ready (MPR) website to test your applications, as part of your MPN benefits
Find available platform tests on Microsoft technologies on the Microsoft Platform Ready dashboard
Learn how Microsoft platform tests can be used to meet the certification requirements of an MPN competency for ISVs
RSC'den Microsoft İş Ortağı Ağı Yardımı Alma

level.title: Submit an incident
level.description: When you submit an incident online, a technical support representative will contact you within one business day.
